oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the main cryptographic features of Boolean functions (balancedness, nonlinearity, algebraic immunity) when, for a given number n of variables, the input to these functions is restricted to some subset E of
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology; Volume 2017, Issue 3; 192-227
